DOC.brief_summary: A prospective pilot study evaluate recanalization safety mechanical thrombectomy cerebral angiogram patient stroke symptom last see normal 8 - 24 hour .
DOC.brief_title: ARISE : After 8 Hours Reperfusion Ischemic Stroke Embolization
DOC.detailed_description: Ischemic stroke patient 8-24 hrs symptom onset without prior mechanical IV thrombolytic treatment screen CT MR perfusion image show penumbra infarction > 1/3rd territory .
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year last see normal 8 24 hour , without prior history intravenous plasminogen activator ( IV tPA ) mechanical thrombectomy Vessels intracranial vertebral artery , basilar artery , intracranial ICA , ICA terminus bifurcation , MCA M1/M2 , ACA NIHSS ≥ 7 MRI DWI/PWI CTA/P , demonstrate area mismatch ≥ 2/3 rd Signed informed consent creat > = 2 NIHSS < 7 Baseline mRS > = 2 infarct > 1/3rd MCA territory compete trial prior IV IA treatment
